lines.text: That <c=#0000FF>Living Memory</c> incriminates him pretty hard, and... he thought a fire would disrupt it.
Slick's never been one to cover his tracks- he's the type that hits and runs.
Well, maybe he tried to be more careful this time!
Maybe. It doesn't look like he had a way to start a fire, though.
The muzzle flash from his gun, I guess?
...No, that don't work. Landlord only heard <c=#FF00FF>one</c> gunshot.
If he fired a second time, to start a fire, someone would notice.
